summary: Provides utilities for parsing and generating iMOD .gen files, supporting both ASCII and Fortran unformatted binary representations of geometric objects such as points, lines, polygons, circles and rectangles. Includes a custom Fortran file wrapper for handling character records and helper routines to translate between internal data structures and the .gen specification.
business_intent: Facilitate exchange of geological model geometry data between iMOD and other software by reading existing .gen files and writing new ones, enabling downstream analysis, visualization, and model construction.
